org.xmldb.xupdate.lexus
Class XUpdateQueryParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xmldb.xupdate.lexus.XUpdateQueryParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
public class XUpdateQueryParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

This class parses the query-String by a SAXParser. The SAXEvents are converted to a list of Integers.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $ $Date: 2002/11/04 14:21:57 $
Author:
SMB, Timothy M. Dean
